thread.title: Moment little girl is literally blown away as she opens front door in high winds
thread.title_full: Moment little girl is literally blown away as she opens front door in high winds

author: Natalie Evans
title: Moment little girl is literally blown away as she opens front door in high winds
text:
News Moment little girl is literally blown away as she opens front door in high winds Four-year-old Madison Gardner was left clinging to the handle as she was swept off her feet by a huge gust of wind Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Little girl is BLOWN AWAY after opening front door in heavy winds Share this video Get daily   
This is the dramatic moment a little girl was literally blown away as she opened her front door during a storm . 
Madison Gardner was left clinging to the door handle as she was swept off her feet by a huge gust of wind. 
The four-year-old was caught on CCTV running up to the front steps of her home in Lyndhurst, Ohio on Wednesday. 
As she opens the door, a huge gust of wind blows the youngster off her feet and out of sight, still clinging to the handle. Read More Little Madison opened the front door during a windstorm (Photo: Facebook/Brittany Gardner) 
Mum Brittany Gardner can be heard gasping before heading to help her daughter 
Thankfully, little Madison wasn't hurt and saw the funny side. 
"She is totally OK," her mum told Fox 8 . "She was scared at first, then was laughing away at it. She held on until I took her off the handle." Read More A huge gust of wind literally blew the youngster away (Photo: Facebook/Brittany Gardner) 
Brittany posted the video on social media, set tongue-in-cheek to Frank Sinatra's 'Come Fly with Me'. 
The clip has been viewed almost 100,000 times online. Like us on Facebook
